_comment: To set up Airtable integration, create a base in Airtable and enter its ID below. To find your base ID, go to airtable.com and navigate to your base. The URL will look like https://airtable.com/appXXXXXXXXXXXXXX/... - the base ID starts with 'app' and is followed by alphanumeric characters.
_table_comment: The table IDs will be filled automatically when you run the app. No need to enter them manually.
